channel.title: Compiling Error (Sorry another one)
channel.description:
Ok, I got the lastest version of JDK 1.6.0 03, I looked over some Tut on path finding, I did one, I did everthing right, but then I come to my compiler and it says:
System cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
I did all the path junk, going to My Computer>View System Information>Advanced>Enviromental Variables, then I add all the paths in the Tutorials
I also checked under Run>cmd. and typed in javac and it showed no errors, I really don't know whats going on

item.title: Compiling Error (Sorry another one)
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

Ok, I think I got it all working

I just restarted my CPU and it all is working

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Error (Sorry another one)
item.dc:creator: @GlobalX GlobalX
item.description:
@GlobalX wrote:

Are you sure you have changed your path to 1.6.0 03? Because the tutorial tells you to imput a different one. You should imput 1.6.0 03.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Error (Sorry another one)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Replace all of your compile file with
javac *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling Error (Sorry another one)
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

use this in ure compiler

@echo off title Compiler color B "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
